DC CODE § 3-1206.01

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The advanced practice registered nurse may perform actions of medical diagnosis, treatment, prescription, and other functions authorized by this subchapter.

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Advanced Registered Nursing; Scope of Practice; Requirement of Protocol; Collaboration. (Refs & Annos)
